column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'm from NYC so I am a bit of a "pizza snob" according to friends. This was well worth the hype. Delicious sauce
column3: buttery delicious flaky crust. Everything deep dish should be. It will be a staple stop for me every time I come here. I am still thinking about it 5 days later and may have to order it shipped to California.
